### Tender - Construction of a Temporary Site Office Complex in the Greater Toronto Area

#### Project Title
Greater Toronto Area Contractor Village - Phase 1

January 15, 2024, at 14:00 EST

Expired

#### Regions of Delivery
* World

#### Organization
* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

#### Contracting Entity Information
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, Canada K1A 0S5
* Contact email: ambreen.dhillon@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca
* Contact name: Ambreen Dhillon

#### Description
The project involves constructing a temporary site office complex in the Greater Toronto Area. The complex will consist of approximately twenty 60' trailers connected side to side to form an office complex roughly 246' x 60' in size. A portion of the site office complex will be constructed with enhanced materials. The scope of work also includes providing complete details about the project in the second phase of the Design Phase (DP). Please see the SAP Ariba Discovery posting for complete project requirements.
